subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: David Nalbandian retired because of a shoulder injury. Nalbandian, 31, spent 13 years on the tour, reaching a No. 3 ranking in 2006.
snippet: David Nalbandian retired because of a shoulder injury. Nalbandian, 31, spent 13 years on the tour, reaching a No. 3 ranking in 2006.
